song.title: Gott och Blandat
song.info:
As quoted from CSDb ("iAN CooG"): "random noise?"
Perhaps this sounds like random noise :P , but in fact this was an attempt to learn how to use the Prophet64 sequencer. So it's like several songs in one song; and I know, the transitions aren't perfect, but hey, there are some parts of that I really like :).
This was made on, and recorded from, a single 8580 SID chip. Just added some EQ and compressor.
Released at Grep White 2008 oldschool music compo.
Download & stream: http://dvibe.se/lofi_gob.html
